links.description:
Define the different email templates sent to the subscriber for the following actions :
- CSR approve a credit - CSR denied a credit - CSR Add a new account - CSR change the subscriber password through the MAM Generate Password dialog.
You can add/change a template by adding a new/already existing entry in the GLOBAL_ONLINE_BILL_ And add the name space name in upper case in the file mam\custom\linklookup\BrandedSiteSystemInformation.xml.
